name: Grandmother's Legacy
description:
The story follows Bellamy as he takes on the restaurant handed down from his grandmother who has recently fallen sick and is not able to continue running the business. His grandmother means a great deal to him and she has been working hard at the restaurant ever since Bellamy was a baby teaching him how to cook and how to properly run the business. It's Bellamy's job to step into her shoes and sort out the food to re-route it to its correct path and location on time so the customers stay happy and the business reputation remains. Work hard and make Grandma proud so she can rest and recover from her illness and once again come back and work this time beside her beloved Grandchild to bring the family business to new heights and to keep it running for future generations. 

Work hard, work smart and show Grandma what you are made off!
